title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
subTitle: We offer comprehensive warranties on our installations and provide quick and reliable repair services to ensure minimal disruption to your energy supply.

starterKit.name: Basic Plan
starterKit.description: Pay-as-you-go model where we install and meter your house, and you buy tokens to recharge.

professionalToolbox.name: Premium Plan
professionalToolbox.description: Outright payment for installation and immediate access to solar or wind energy.
